rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with a welcoming area that adheres to Vastu by aligning the main door towards the east. The hallway leads into both private and public zones.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment 1
rooms.description: Open space with multifunctional furniture to serve as living area by day and bedroom at night. The layout is designed per Vastu principles with the bed facing east.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment 2
rooms.description: Open space serving as a multifunctional area for living and sleeping. The arrangement includes designated zones for work and relaxation in compliance with Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: The dining area is conveniently located near the kitchen and designed to promote family interactions. It respects local building norms with sufficient natural lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed for efficient workflow following the principles of Vastu; gas hob and sink are placed in appropriate directions.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open area for leisure activities designed with adequate lighting and ventilation as per Vastu and local norms.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: The door aligns with the main facade following Vastu principles by facing east.

openings.name: Emergency Exit
openings.description: Secondary exit for safety purposes, strategically placed as per building norms.

openings.name: Swimming Pool Access
openings.description: Provides direct access to the swimming pool area from the ground floor; designed with an adjoining deck for relaxation.

amenities.name: Swimming Pool
amenities.description: A well-designed pool area occupying the southern part of the plot, ensuring privacy and compliance with local building regulations.

rooms.name: Mezzanine Lounge
rooms.description: An elevated space providing an alternative vantage point of the living area. This design adheres to Vastu principles with open views towards the east.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: Connects ground floor to mezzanine level while following building norms and ensuring safety.

rooms.name: Private Study/Cabin
rooms.description: A quiet area designed for work, study, or meditation with Vastu-aligned positioning to maximize productivity and calmness.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: Provides natural light and a view of the surroundings in accordance with Vastu principles.
